TopicTitle: Lost name of a handrail-adding mod... *SOLVED*

Articles.Content:
Hi there,

there was once a mod, that added some extra handrail parts to the game, so you don't have to float around your station...

Any idea, how it is called and if it is 1.0.2 ready?

Greetings, Horman

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-15T18:57:11Z" title="06/15/2015 06:57  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 15, 2015</time> by Horman**

that would probably be [Nebula Space Engineering's EVA Handrail Pack](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/100531-0-25-NEBULA-space-engineering-EVA-handrails-pack)

It says .25, but it should work in 1.0.2 just fine, since there's no stack attaching parts that I can see.
